short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for *ignoring* Youtube advertisements. Shows a fun little intermission animation while advertisements are playing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For those who don't like getting loudly interrupted while watching YouTube, but also don't want to deny YouTube creators' ad revenue ;)

Open source, published at GitHub:
https://github.com/adignorerdev/ad-ignorer-for-youtube
